p: By virtue of having the highest incidence of any United States region, Southern states also have the opportunity to make the greatest impact on incident HIV with better viral suppression of PWH. In 2014, Southern states account for an estimated 44% percent of all PWH (diagnosed and undiagnosed) in the United States despite being populated by only a third (37%) of the overall population. Geographically, Southern states are a focus region for the ‘Ending the HIV Epidemic’ initiative.
